name: Blackout (itch) (CARL FARRA!!)
description:
In Blackout, you can't move, you can't see, and something's coming to get you!

Put on some headphones to tell where monsters are coming from, and shoot where you think they might be. With skill, patience, and a little luck, you could make it out alive.

This game was designed for the Netherlands Game Awards 2013.

Design: Carl Farra & Tarek Jisr

Code: Mohammad Ghaddar

Art : Ralph Abou Raad

Additional Art from Unity Asset Store

Sound: Soundbible.com
